page.title: 15TRANSPORT
page.content:
{TRANSPORT
Arnside is well served by both rail and bus services. There is a regular rail service on the main line from {Barrow}which connects with the {Glasgow - London}line and{Lancaster - {Leeds}line at{Carnforth. The bus service is mainly between Arnside and{Kendal}via{Milnthorpe although there are some bus services which travel to{Lancaster}via {Silverdale}and{Carnforth. Neither the rail nor bus services are very well used by the local population unless they are travelling long distances as most people in Arnside have cars. The road network is very complex between Arnside and the south but there is a good road to Milnthorpe and easy access to the M6 at Farleton.
